titleStmt.title: The nevv projector; or The priviledged cheat: who when men do come to receive satisfaction, doth answer them all, I have got a protection.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Gilbertson at the Bible in Giltspur-street.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "I Am a projector that alwaies have thriv'd ..."
Cf. Wing N722 which does not have "London" in the imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
